title: Desktop Recording SDK by Recall.ai
author: Michael Seibel
excerpt: Recall.ai Desktop Recording SDK pulls recordings, transcripts, and metadata into your app without bots. Integrates with Electron applications in under five minutes to get live data from Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams.

Payment Required

Recall.ai Desktop Recording SDK pulls recordings, transcripts, and metadata into your app without bots. Integrates with Electron applications in under five minutes to get live data from Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams.
